| HistoryText             = During the 1860s, Marietta was was hunting in [[Paris (France)|Paris]], [[France]]. One evening she came upon the [[Natsume Masako (Earth-616)|wife]] of the [[Sakai Masaaki (Earth-616)|Japanese diplomat]] reading in her private garden. Marietta attacked and killed her victim, but she was unaware that her victim was [[Jasmine Destine (Earth-616)|Jasmine Destine]] who instinctively transferred her own my into Marietta's body and expelled the dark spirit. As Cuckoo tried to reoriented herself in Borgezia's body, Prince Masaaki entered the garden to find his wife dead and attacked seeing Cuckoo in Borgezia body, forcing her to flee.{{r|ClanDestine Vol 2 4}}

When Cuckoo took over Borgezia's body and expelled her consciousness, she inadvertently re-ensouled all of the vampires sired by Borgezia. Grateful, the group bonded, came to regard Cuckoo as part of their family even as she moved into other host bodies.{{r|ClanDestine Vol 2 4}}

Shortly after the death of [[Kay Cera (Earth-616)|Kay Cera]], Cuckoo convinced her sister [[Samantha Destine (Earth-616)|Samantha Hassard]] to come with her to a "Goth Carnival Masquerade" party hosted by her her vampyr friends at [[Blasco Castle]].{{r|ClanDestine Vol 2 2|3}} When [[Rory Destine (Earth-616)|Rory]] and [[Pandora Destine (Earth-616)|Pandora]] unexpectedly arrive to the castle, Cuckoo ask her friends to give the twins a scare.{{r|ClanDestine Vol 2 3}}
